name: Citation Network
description: Maps backlinks, brand mentions, and citation patterns that AI models use to assess authority.

insights.title: Quality Over Quantity
insights.description: Your backlink profile prioritizes relevant, high-authority sources over volume. AI values this.

insights.title: Industry Publication Citations
insights.description: Featured in 12 industry publications this quarter, boosting entity recognition.

insights.title: Diverse Anchor Text Profile
insights.description: Natural anchor text distribution signals organic link acquisition to AI.

issues.title: Low Wikipedia Presence
issues.description: Your brand has no Wikipedia mention, missing a key AI knowledge source.

issues.title: Toxic Backlinks Detected
issues.description: 47 potentially harmful backlinks identified that could hurt credibility.

issues.title: Limited Academic Citations
issues.description: No citations from research papers or academic sources, unlike top competitors.

recommendations.description: Build notability through PR and media coverage to warrant Wikipedia inclusion.
Submit disavow file for identified harmful backlinks.
Collaborate with academic institutions for research citations.
